Key.Original: The Piranha IIIC is an infantry fighting vehicle. El Piranha IIIC is armed with a 40 mm grenade launcher LAG40 and a coaxial 12,70 mm machinegun, providing not only a carrying capacity, but also reliable fire support.
Key.Spanish: El Piranha IIIC es un vehículo de combate de infantería. El Piranha IIIC está armado con un lanzagradas LAG 40 mm y una ametralladora coaxial 12,70 mm. No solo proporciona capacidad de transporte, sino también un fuego de apoyo fiable.
Key.English: The Piranha IIIC is an infantry fighting vehicle. El Piranha IIIC is armed with a 40 mm grenade launcher LAG40 and a coaxial 12,70 mm machinegun, providing not only a carrying capacity, but also reliable fire support.

Key.Original: The Piranha IIIC (Recon) is an infantry fighting vehicle. El Piranha IIIC (Recon) is armed with a Mk 30 mm cannon and a coaxial 7,62 mm machinegun, providing not only a carrying capacity, but also reliable fire support against light vehicles.
Key.Spanish: El Piranha IIIC (Recon) es un vehículo de combate de reconocimiento. El Piranha IIIC (Recon) está armado con un cañon de Mk 30 mm y una ametralladora coaxial 7,62 mm. No solo proporciona capacidad de transporte, sino también un fuego de apoyo contra vehículos ligeros.
Key.English: The Piranha IIIC (Recon) is an infantry fighting vehicle. El Piranha IIIC (Recon) is armed with a Mk 30 mm cannon and a coaxial 7,62 mm machinegun, providing not only a carrying capacity, but also reliable fire support against light vehicles.
